name: InstaGib Arena
description:
I'm someone who grew up with classics like Quake 3 and Unreal Tournament and was particular fond of the InstaGib mods, I've always felt like that was the most even and fair battlefield you could find in a game and now I want to make my own contribution.

I'm developing this game on my spare time outside of my regular job, but that doesn't mean that progress will be slow, but as a solo developer it can only go so fast.

Please leave a comment and let me know what you think! You can also send me a message on Discord: iShot#3779
